title: Camera/Audio
content:
Camera/Audio # Use when you want to record your face and voice during recording.
For first time use, browser will ask you for camera access. Please choose Allow on every visit

title: Initialize workspace
content:
Workspace # Workspace is a folder in your machine disk that containing cherry studio record files, media files, … We only have one workspace used at a time.
Initialize # Init workspace from empty folder Go to dashboard and click Init workspace . Then choose empty folder
Init workspace from existing workspace folder Go to dashboard and click Init workspace . Then choose a folder having init.csow file inside.
Detach # If you have multiple workspace, you can detach and init workspace again anytime. It’s harmless action because detaching won’t delete workspace file/folder in disk.

title: Screen
content:
Screen # Use this to record changes in your IDE
Supported IDE # For now, only Vscode
Preparation # download extension here install: code --install-extension cherry-vsc-recorder.vsix then follow the rest instruction Demo # https://youtu.be/8QC6vB-UNus

title: Screen
content:
Screen # You can use this to capture the a browser, or any application running in your machine or entire screen.
Note**
Only can add maximum 3 screens at the same time. No restriction on how many screen in total during recording.
For first time use, browser will ask you for camera access. Please choose Allow on every visit

title: Terminal
content:
Terminal # Use this to record your terminal content
Preparation # If you don’t have pipx installed, follow this guideline
install cherryterm pipx install cherryterm verify installation: cherryterm version => Cherryterm version: 0.1.2
then follow the rest instruction Demo # https://youtu.be/8QC6vB-UNus
